original_text: He will do all kinds of bad things that deceive people. The people that he deceives are people that God will destroy. Those people believe false things because they have refused to accept God's true message. If they had loved that true message, God would have saved them.
korean_text: 불의의 모든 속임으로 멸망하는 자들에게 있으리니 이는 그들이 진리의 사랑을 받지 아니하여 구원함을 받지 못함이라

sentences.original_text: He will do all kinds of bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 온갖 나쁜 일들을 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: are people that God will destroy
because they have refused to accept God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 참된 메시지를 받아들이기를 거절했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: If they had loved that true message
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 그 참된 메시지를 사랑했었다면
